casebody.data:
99-0579 (La. 4/23/99)

Sandie EVANS v. Louis Phillip NOGUES, III DDS and Medical Protective Company. No. 99-C-0579. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Evans, Sandie; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of St. Bernard 34th Judicial District Court Div. “A” Number 76-244; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-1827

Denied.

LEMMON, J. not on panel.
